snippet: STAMLER--Joseph. Congregation Emanu-El of the City of New York records with deep sorrow the death of our cherished member, Joseph Stamler. To his family and loved ones we express our profound sympathy. It is our hope and prayer that beautiful memory brings comfort to those who mourn his passing. 1/3
lead_paragraph: STAMLER--Joseph. Congregation Emanu-El of the City of New York records with deep sorrow the death of our cherished member, Joseph Stamler. To his family and loved ones we express our profound sympathy. It is our hope and prayer that beautiful memory brings comfort to those who mourn his passing. 1/3
